provider.name: HTTP
provider.desc: HTTP or HTTPS download with standard clear-text username/password.

provider.name: FTP
provider.desc: Passive or active FTP with standard clear-text username/password.

provider.name: S3
provider.desc: The Amazon AWS Simple Storage Service. You must sign up with Amazon to get username and password.

provider.name: IA
provider.desc: The Internet Archive. You must sign up with ia.org to get username and password.
